Tell your senator!
Well said. The senate should vote YES on the GENIUS act and pass stablecoin legislation.

Wow - growing fast

Excited for the senate vote on stablecoin legislation next week!

Take a minute to email your senator via 
@standwithcrypto
 and let them know it is important to vote for the GENIUS act.

Shields up! The crypto voter has been activated 

Take a few seconds to let your senators know that you expect them to support comprehensive stablecoin legislation

Cyber criminals bribed and recruited rogue overseas support agents to pull personal data on <1% of Coinbase MTUs. No passwords, private keys, or funds were exposed. Prime accounts are untouched. We will reimburse impacted customers. More here: http://coinbase.com/blog/protecting-our-customers-standing-up-to-extortionists…

If you use 
@CoinbaseDev
 APIs, you will be rewarded.

Earn 4.1% on the USDC you hold in CDP Wallets.

Get paid to bring the world onchain.

HTTP 402 “Payment Required” was always in the internet’s blueprint.

With x402, it finally means something—real-time API payments, no human-in-the-loop.

Agents can now operate truly autonomously.

It’s time to get stablecoin legislation passed to create clear rules for crypto in America.
52m Americans have used crypto and want to see regulatory clarity.

stablecoin usage is growing incredibly fast on 
@base

"Senate leadership on both sides of the aisle should avoid political games and pass a final stablecoin bill in the coming days"

Well said

We need more special economic zones in the U.S. 

We should designate ~10 or so like this across different pieces of federal land, each with its own exemption from federal and state law.

One for bio, one for drones/aviation, one for crypto, one for robotics, one for mining, etc.

@ProsperaGlobal

2. My goal is that in 5-10 years, getting into COIN50 index will feel as good as this

Coinbase just became the first and only crypto company to join the S&P 500.

This milestone represents what the true believers, from retail investors to institutional investors to our employees and partners, knew all along.

Crypto is here to stay.
